Title: The Town Is Quiet
Writer: Jean-Louis Milesi (scenario and dialogue), Robert Guédiguian (scenario and dialogue)
Actors: Ariane Ascaride, Jean-Pierre Darroussin, Gérard Meylan, Jacques Boudet
Plot: A dark tale of working-class life in Marseilles, a city in crisis. Interesting characters include a hard-bitten but compassionate fish market worker with a drug addicted daughter and a moody bartender with a shocking secret life.
